AnimationPlay.summary: The play() method of the Web Animations API's Interface starts or resumes playing of an animation. If the animation is finished, calling play() restarts the animation, playing it from the beginning.

remarks.para:
-Web Animations API
- for other methods and properties you can use to control web page animation.
- to pause an animation.
- to play an animation backwards.
- to finish an animation.
- to cancel an animation.
